verses.name: 2 Corinthians 12:14
verses.text: Behold, the third time I am ready to come to you; and I will not be burdensome to you: for I seek not yours, but you: for the children ought not to lay up for the parents, but the parents for the children.

verses.name: 2 Corinthians 12:15
verses.text: And I will very gladly spend and be spent for you; though the more abundantly I love you, the less I be loved.

verses.name: 2 Corinthians 12:16
verses.text: But be it so, I did not burden you: nevertheless, being crafty, I caught you with guile.

verses.name: 2 Corinthians 12:17
verses.text: Did I make a gain of you by any of them whom I sent unto you?
